data.message: How about on this Veteran's Day - you fill our feed with how we can help and donate to save our Vets and not EBOLA!   More Vets die after they get home from suicide than Ebola has ever killed.   This is what is messed up with FB!

replies.message: Then why is Obama asking for $6B to fight Ebola.  You argument doesn't hold because VA hasn't done the job and our government is spending more to fight Ebola than fixing the VA. The point is FB can direct appropriate donate requests based on location and supporting wounded warriors or similar on the eve if Veterans Day would be more powerful for a USA user.  This could be a powerful fundraiser if it wasn't so misguided by political optics.
